Articles.Content: Is there a mod with working fairings for 1.12.2? I gave both procedural fairings and KW a try. Procedural doesn't work at all, and I can't even get KW parts to show up in 1.12.2, even after editing the version file.
The KW fairing mod has been working fine in 1.12.2. I didn't install the full KW, only fairings and any dependencies via CKAN.

I'm assuming you allowed ckan to install mods for 1.11, then installed it? I'll give that a try. 

 

EDIT: I don't get it. I previously put the files exactly where ckan has put them, but it works now. 

Edited October 29, 2021 by MarcAlain
Simple adjustable fairings work wonders. BDB has tons of fairings using the mod.
